comment:
Tryin to keep motivatin & stay motivated!
We took in a 2nd homeless Veteran this week.
We dont have much, but I cant stand to see a bro in arms, down & out.
IF I CAN help, I try.
No 22 a day on our watch!!!!
#PPLHELPINGPPL

$JUSTICE4ALL007
